# The `CallGraphUpdater.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file provides interfaces used to manipulate a call graph, regardless if it is a &quot;old style&quot; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraph">CallGraph</a> or an &quot;new style&quot; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph">LazyCallGraph</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file provides interfaces used to manipulate a call graph, regardless if it is a &quot;old style&quot; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callgraph">CallGraph</a> or an &quot;new style&quot; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazycallgraph">LazyCallGraph</a>.
